timeline.message: Added code to support versioning and snapshot for set access tier
Do not break existing delete code
Do not break existing delete code

timeline.bodyText: Given this is internal would it be better to splay out the BlobBatchSetBlobAccessTierOptions parameters so we don't need to instantiate short lived objects in the other overloads.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: I'm not too attached to either format but this just keeps things consistent with how we deal with overloads in other places. But splaying out the parameters seems fine due to the small number of params.
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to eagerly promote this in public API given it's only use is in Blob Batch?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: It's also used in Blob's getBlobUrl. That was actually where the method originally existed and I wanted to pull it out to prevent duplication
replies.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: Given there are more use cases for this sounds good to add.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - Added appendQueryParam method to support adding version and snapshot support to BlobBatch setTier.
          
          
            
            - Added appendQueryParameter method to support adding version and snapshot support to BlobBatch setTier.
          
      
    
    
  

If we retain the new helper function.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,7 @@
 ## 12.8.0-beta.2 (Unreleased)
 - Added support for setting tags and filterTags operations on SAS by adding to AccountSASPermissions.
 - Fixed bug where FluxInputStream would throw when a ByteBuffer of length 0 was encountered.
+- Added appendQueryParam method to support adding version and snapshot support to BlobBatch setTier.

timeline.bodyText: I think maybe like getBlobIdentifier might be more appropriate since it's not just the path?
timeline.author: rickle-msft
